dcterms:creator: K. Yun
J. Honorio
D. Chattopadhyay
T.L. Berg
D. Samaras
dcterms:description: A dataset acquired using the Microsoft Kinect sensor, containing 282 moving skeleton sequences performed by two interacting individuals across 8 categories: 'approaching', 'departing', 'pushing', 'kicking', 'punching', 'exchanging objects', 'hugging', and 'hand shaking'. Each sequence includes 3D coordinates of 15 joints.
dcterms:title: SBU Interaction

dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1175 skeletons belonging to 45 action categories performed by 6 individuals in 3 scenarios. Each skeleton includes 21 hand joints with 3D coordinates across video frames, showcasing high variability in action styles, speeds, scales, and viewpoints.
dcterms:title: First-Person Hand Action (FPHA)
